用户名至少2个字符: Username must be at least 2 characters
用户名最多20个字符: Username must be at most 20 characters
用户名只能包含字母、数字、下划线和中文: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and Chinese characters
密码至少6个字符: Password must be at least 6 characters
密码最多50个字符: Password must be at most 50 characters
两次输入的密码不一致: The two passwords entered are inconsistent
请输入有效的邀请码: Please enter a valid invitation code
登录后部分配置会进行云端同步，其他功能没有任何差异: After logging in, some configurations will be synchronized to multiple devices, and other functions have no difference
邀请码需要分享一个你自己的有效合集到市场或其他贡献，截图发送邮箱获取。大部分情况: Invitation codes need to be shared at least once to the store, and screenshots can be sent to the email address to get the code
多设备中最后一次编辑的数据将会覆盖云端。如果你不希望本机数据覆盖云端，请触发一次: The last edited data among multiple devices will overwrite the cloud. If you do not want local data to overwrite the cloud, please trigger a data update on the latest device before logging in.
登录失败，请检查用户名和密码是否正确: Login failed, please check username and password
Registration success, redirecting to login page...
注册失败，请检查邀请码或用户信息: Registration failed, please check invitation code or user information
邀请码需要分享一个你自己的有效合集到市场或其他贡献，截图发送邮箱获取。大部分情况: Invitation codes need to be obtained by sharing one of your valid collections to the market or making other contributions, and sending a screenshot to the email. In most cases, you will not need the functions after logging in.
